column4: bah! Such a small problem, why don't mouse side buttons ever work in Ubuntu.  5 years ago this was a constant problem.  Apparently still is.
did you file the bug report 5 years ago :) ?
right, but since you didn't care to report it so it could be fixed for you and the others, it's a bit intriguing to read your complain
wikis provide work arounds, real fixes come from bug reports ;)
